@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Substracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add
owned

@dev The owned constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
attributes.name: owned

attributes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation: @dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
Constrctor function
     * Initializes contract with initial supply tokens to the creator of the contract
attributes.name: TokenERC20

attributes.documentation: Internal transfer, only can be called by this contract
attributes.name: _transfer

attributes.documentation:
Transfer tokens
     * Send `_value` tokens to `_to` from your account
     * @param _to The address of the recipient
@param _value the amount to send
attributes.name: transfer
transferFrom

attributes.documentation:
Set allowance for other address
     * Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` tokens in your behalf
     * @param _spender The address authorized to spend
@param _value the max amount they can spend
attributes.name: approve
approveAndCall

attributes.documentation:
Destroy tokens
     * Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly
     * @param _value the amount of money to burn
attributes.name: burn

attributes.documentation:
Destroy tokens from other account
     * Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly on behalf of `_from`.
     * @param _from the address of the sender
@param _value the amount of money to burn
attributes.name: burnFrom
mintToken
freezeAccount
setPrices

attributes.documentation: @notice Buy tokens from contract by sending ether
attributes.name: buy

 @param amount amount of tokens to be sold
attributes.name: sell
